title: The Dictionary of Cliches: Guide to 4,000 Overused Phrases
description:
The Dictionary of Cliches: A Word Lover's Guide to 4,000 Overused Phrases and Almost-Pleasing Platitudes

2013
epub


The largest, most comprehensive, and most entertaining reference of its kind, The Dictionary of ClichÃƒÂ©s features more than four thousand unique clichÃƒÂ©s and common expressions. Author Christine Ammer explores the phrases and terms that enliven our language and uncovers expressions that have long been considered dead. With each entry, she includes a thorough definition, origin of the term, and an insightful example.

 Some of the clichÃƒÂ©s brought into the limelight include:
